001package eu.andredick.configuration;
002
003import eu.andredick.aco.algorithm.ACOAlgorithm;
004import eu.andredick.aco.ant.ACOAnt;
005import eu.andredick.aco.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm;
006import eu.andredick.aco.ant.AbstractAnt;
007import eu.andredick.aco.combination.CombinationFactor;
008import eu.andredick.aco.construction.AbstractConstruction;
009import eu.andredick.aco.construction.ConstructionFromSubsets;
010import eu.andredick.aco.heuristic.HeuristicInfoSet;
011import eu.andredick.aco.localsearch.AbstractLocalSearch;
012import eu.andredick.aco.localsearch.LocalSearchNone;
013import eu.andredick.aco.masterprocess.AbstractMasterProcess;
014import eu.andredick.aco.masterprocess.MasterProcessBasic;
015import eu.andredick.aco.nextstep.AbstractNextStepStrategy;
016import eu.andredick.aco.nextstep.NextStepStrategyOnSubsetsStochastic;
017import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneassociation.PheromoneOnSubsets;
018import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneevaporation.AbstractPheromoneEvaporation;
019import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneevaporation.PheromoneEvaporation;
020import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneinit.AbstractPheromoneInit;
021import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneinit.PheromoneInit;
022import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneperception.AbstractPheromonePerception;
023import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneperception.PerceptionSimple;
024import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneupdate.AbstractPheromoneUpdate;
025import eu.andredick.aco.pheromoneupdate.PheromoneUpdateOnSubsets;
026import eu.andredick.aco.solutionquality.SolutionQualityMin;
027import eu.andredick.aco.termination.TerminationCriterion;
028import eu.andredick.scp.SCPSolution;
029import eu.andredick.scp.SCProblem;
030
031public class AlgorithmConfiguration_Randomwalk extends AbstractAlgorithmConfiguration {
032
033
034    @Override
035    public void prepareConfigParameters() {
036
037        this.configName = "AlgorithmConfiguration_Randomwalk";
038        // 信息素初始值配置
039        ConfigurationParameter<Float> phInitValue =
040                new ConfigurationParameter<>("pheromonInitValue", 1f);
041        this.addConfigurationParameter(phInitValue);
042//        phInitValue.setCurrentValue();
043
044        // 信息素蒸发因子设置
045        ConfigurationParameter<Float> evapFactor =
046                new ConfigurationParameter<>("evaporationFactor", 0.0f);
047        this.addConfigurationParameter(evapFactor);
048//        evapFactor.setCurrentValue();
049
050        // 最大迭代次数设置
051        ConfigurationParameter<Integer> maxIterations =
052                new ConfigurationParameter<>("maxIterations", 100);
053        this.addConfigurationParameter(maxIterations);
054//        maxIterations.setCurrentValue();
055
056        // 蚂蚁种群数量设置
057        this.getParameter("antsize").setCurrentValue(10);
058
059    }
060
061    @Override
062    public AbstractAlgorithm create(SCProblem problem) {
063
064        PheromoneOnSubsets pheromoneStructure =
065                new PheromoneOnSubsets(problem);
066
067        float phInitValue = this.getParameter("pheromonInitValue").getCurrentValue().floatValue();
068        AbstractPheromoneInit pheromoneInitRule =
069                new PheromoneInit(phInitValue);
070
071        float evapFactor = this.getParameter("evaporationFactor").getCurrentValue().floatValue();
072        AbstractPheromoneEvaporation evaporationRule;
073        evaporationRule = new PheromoneEvaporation(evapFactor);
074
075        pheromoneStructure.setEvaporationRule(evaporationRule);
076        pheromoneStructure.setPheromoneInitRule(pheromoneInitRule);
077
078        AbstractPheromoneUpdate updateRule =
079                new PheromoneUpdateOnSubsets(pheromoneStructure, new SolutionQualityMin());
080
081        float alpha = 0f;
082        float beta = 0f;
083
084        HeuristicInfoSet heuristicInfoSet = new HeuristicInfoSet();
085        AbstractPheromonePerception perceptionRule = new PerceptionSimple();
086
087        AbstractNextStepStrategy nextStepRule =
088                new NextStepStrategyOnSubsetsStochastic(pheromoneStructure, perceptionRule, heuristicInfoSet, new CombinationFactor(alpha, beta));
089
090        AbstractConstruction constructionStrategy =
091                new ConstructionFromSubsets(nextStepRule);
092
093        AbstractLocalSearch localSearchStrategy =
094                new LocalSearchNone();
095
096        int antSize = this.getParameter("antsize").getCurrentValue().intValue();
097        AbstractAnt[] ants = new AbstractAnt[antSize];
098        for (int i = 0; i < ants.length; i++) {
099            ants[i] = new ACOAnt<SCPSolution, SCProblem>(problem, updateRule, constructionStrategy, localSearchStrategy);
100        }
101
102        TerminationCriterion terminationCriterion =
103                new TerminationCriterion(this.getParameter("maxIterations").getCurrentValue().intValue());
104
105        AbstractMasterProcess masterProcess = new MasterProcessBasic(pheromoneStructure, ants, terminationCriterion);
106
107        return new ACOAlgorithm(masterProcess);
108    }
109
110}
